item.title: How To Change The Starting Home (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

are you using a [508]?

if you are using a [508] this is how its done.

go in player.java . search for something that look like this (it should not be hard its a small file)

// initial x and y coordinates of the player
	heightLevel = 0;
	// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
	teleportToX = 3031;//3031;
	teleportToY = 3292;//3292;

change the X and Y chords to where you want the new home to be. Also in the player.java filer there is all the info (starting stuff and clothes etc)

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change The Starting Home (Delta)
